item.title: SCOOP: Dept of Energy says it saved $700M in Trump's first 100 days by cutting 'wasteful' programs
item.description: During Trump's first 100 days in office, the Energy Department has immediately saved taxpayers $700 million. It is projected that over time the cuts w...

item.title: Trump’s border czar tells illegal immigrants they ‘cannot hide from ICE’ amid mass deportation agenda
item.description: Illegal immigrants will not be able to escape U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, President Donald Trump's border czar Tom Homan said Monday.

item.title: White House touts 100-day illegal immigration crackdown after Biden 'unsecured the border on purpose'
item.description: ICE chief Tom Homan touted a 96% decrease in illegal border crossings under President Donald Trump's administration during a Monday press conference.
